name: Crypto Underworld Podcast Bootstrap
description:
Crypto Underworld Podcast comes from the AFA/LCD discussions breaking down the scams we find and investigating how they work and who are behind them. 
We think there is a massive disservice to the crypto community and new users to not have an easy place to listen in for "buyer beware" verbose as well as coverage on crypto fundamentals, self-regulation, and everything in-between. 
No shilling projects, no covering the price of BTC day to day, just pure talk and a few guests here and there!

nftPaymentSuccessModal.content: Thank you for contributing to Crypto Underworld!

payDisclosure: Anons who help bootstrap this project are not guaranteed to receive anything in return - we hope to provide value with entertainment and information. Beyond the podcast itself, we are looking into ways to reward and provide a return to individuals who help us get started - at this time the exact methods are unclear. Please only give on a donation basis with no expectations of anything in return.
